name: summar-ai-powered-summarizer
description: Summarizes the content of web pages and PDFs using the OpenAI API.

scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run compile && npm run copy:pluginfiles && npm run copy:jsonfiles && npm run copy:swiftfile && npm run zip
scripts.build-installer: npm run build && npm run installer:setup && npm run installer:copy-plugin && npm run installer:build
scripts.installer:dev: npm run build && npm run installer:copy-plugin && cd installer && npm run dev
scripts.copy:pluginfiles: cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp src/styles.css dist/styles.css
scripts.copy:jsonfiles: cp src/models.json dist/models.json && cp src/prompts.json dist/prompts.json && cp src/model-pricing.json dist/model-pricing.json
scripts.zip: cd dist && zip -r summar.zip manifest.json styles.css main.js models.json prompts.json model-pricing.json fetch_calendar.swift
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.build:test: npm run build && npm run test:all
scripts.dev:test: npm run build && npm run deploy:local && npm run test:e2e
